content.description:
Source: Pixabay

The chickens shown in the image are an example of value-added agriculture used by small family-run farms to compete with large agribusiness poultry and egg farms.
content.question: Which of the following types of value-added products best describes the kind of agriculture shown in the image?

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify the different types of information presented in visual sources.
